Name: Woodle Tree 2: Deluxe Plus
About the game: Will you be skilled enough to help Woodle in his quest to repel this enormous new evil force? Explore the wonderful lands and find a way to restore balance in this new Open World Platformer Adventure with RPG elements. Travel across immense forests and deserts, hills and seashores, from the highest mountains to the bottomless oceans as you meet new characters that will help in your own personal adventure while fighting challenging enemies. FEATURES: · Platforming sections completely redesigned for the most hardcore gamers in this new Deluxe Edition · A vast world to explore freely! · Fast paced new abilities and puzzles · Power ups and items to upgrade Woodle and his Leaf · local co-op up to 4 players to experience the main adventure with your friends! · New bizarre characters that you’ll meet meet during your quest: will they help or hinder you? LEVELS: · Explore a total of 9 worlds that you'll be able to explore in single player or with your friends in local co-op! · New exceptional hard challenges levels are waiting for you in the 'Sleepin' Flowers' DLC (included in the full game) · Complete the side missions in the game to be able to upgrade Woodle with new weapons, items and abilities. The Deluxe Plus edition features: · Re-worked level designs · improved controls · new animations · new abilities · lots of new unlockables · new challenges/puzzles, enemies, characters, music and levels.
